verses.name: Genesis 36:38
verses.text: And Saul died, and Baal–hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.

verses.name: Genesis 36:39
verses.text: And Baal–hanan the son of Achbor died, and Hadar reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pau; and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.

verses.name: Genesis 36:40
verses.text: And these are the names of the dukes that came of Esau, according to their families, after their places, by their names; duke Timnah, duke Alvah, duke Jetheth,

verses.name: Genesis 36:41
verses.text: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,

verses.name: Genesis 36:42
verses.text: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
